question:
With reference to the Lignite coal, consider the following statements:
  1. Lignite has higher moisture content in comparison to Bituminous coal
  2. Lignite is softer in comparison to Bituminous coal
  3. In India, Lignite is found in Tamil Nadu, Gujarat as well as Rajasthan
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation:
Lignite has higher moisture content in comparison to Bituminous coal
Lignite is softer in comparison to Bituminous coal
The above two are correct statements.Â Lignite is the softest coal, has the highest moisture content and is used for generating electricity in certain parts of the country and for conversion into synthetic gas.
In India, Lignite is found in Tamil Nadu, Gujarat as well as Rajasthan
This is also a correct statement. Lignite occurs in coastal areas of Tamil Nadu, Gujarat and also in the inland basin of Rajasthan.
